affect ( "fonzie", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "player" );

	task ( "say1" )
	{
		set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "SHOP1" );
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/shop1/guards/director_expecting.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "SHOP1_057" );
	}

	dowait ( "say1" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "NULL" );
}
